headline.print_headline: UN General Assembly to Focus on War on Extremists
headline.main: UN General Assembly to Focus on War on Extremists

lead_paragraph: A brutal terrorist organization that calls itself a state but lacks recognition from any government will take center stage when more than 140 heads of state and government convene for the annual ministerial meeting of the U.N. General Assembly this week.
